channel.title: Error with my client, need help [317]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/r0r2uc.png[/img]
Everytime I run my client, I get that error above. I've looked and looked and can't seem to find the problem. I'm using demolishscape client, the old Pimpscape client. I have the EGUI file, but for some reason it says it can't find it. What could be the problem? Thanks for the help!

item.title: Error with my client, need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Blind Gnome, post:7, topic:438430”]If you open up the .bat file it should have soemthing like

@echo off title Client cd bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m client 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
Some clients use Jre7(or 6) so try replacing the place to your jre7(or 6) instead of JDk, or try downloading java jdk 7[/quote]
What? o.O

Read full topic
item.source: Error with my client, need help [317]

item.title: Error with my client, need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Blind_Gnome Blind Gnome
item.description:
@Blind_Gnome wrote:

If you open up the .bat file it should have soemthing like

@echo off title Client cd bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m client 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
Some clients use Jre7(or 6) so try replacing the place to your jre7(or 6) instead of JDk, or try downloading java jdk 7

Read full topic
item.source: Error with my client, need help [317]

item.title: Error with my client, need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

I’m having the same problem as we speak, I tried looking for solutions but nobody knows. I’ve looked on Google as well. Have you fixed this yet? Sorry for gravedigging I couldn’t find any up-to-date topics.

Read full topic

item.title: Error with my client, need help [317]

item.description:
@Aventura wrote:

I’ve done that already… I’m running Jdk1.6.0_29… The thing I don’t understand is it will open Gurkans Refactored client just fine, but won’t open this client up.

Read full topic
